title: VITAMIN C
content: Assists in the synthesis and transport of collagen in the body. Provides antioxidant benefits. Vitamin C helps destroy the compounds that reduce collagen, so both together assist the immune system by providing vitamins and proteins to our body.

title: BIOTIN
content: It is part of the B group vitamins (B7) and boosts the health of your hair, nails, and skin.Biotin is an important part of the body's enzymes that break down substances such as fats,carbohydrates, and other elements. Biotin also helps with brain function, reduces fatigue and tiredness, and helps prevent nerve swelling.

title: HYALURONIC ACID
content: It's a polysaccharide molecule naturally present in the human body that retains moisture in the skin, which keeps the skin much more hydrated by having less brittle nails and healthier, shinier hair. Hyaluronic acid prevents the joints from forming painful friction and works as a cartilage restorer.
